values:
*After getting kicked out of Kai and Saru's lovenest during the mass-move, Nagasumi had been staying in the Nurse's Office. In that time, Priscilla had neglected to get the letter with his new room number in it- she'd only graced him with the coffee-stained, crumpled up envelope today.    

To her credit, she at least gave him a box of chocolates as an apology. 

But, hmm.. Kafuka and Zushio in room 344. The second name really sounded familiar-- 

OH WHATEVER ENOUGH THINKING HE WANTED A SHOWER NOW. Tucking the box of sweets under his arm, he rapped on the door three times!*

*In the afternoon, Nagasumi sits at a desk in the detention hall. Though he was unfairly punished, he looks decently calm and happy! 

Enjoying the free hour, he knits. He knits like a champion. Look at this bitch go. Oh man. OH MAN.*

*Sitting at a table with his mask, which he took on solo, split clear in half.*

Some guy I am.
*playing SOLITAIRE on the couch in The Tsunderes dorm, sexy sexy sexy.*

*Finding himself with little other Job Qualifications (and a burning desire to absolutely not work in retail), Nagasumi works the lawnmower with the local landscaping service. He barely manages to pay rent on his little boiler room apartment, sob. Oh well, these lawns ain't gonna trim themselves. Feel free to bother him as he moves his strong, bare shoulders with the mower, and gently wipes sweat from his manly brow.*

*For the past while, Nagasumi has been meticulously browsing one of the many flower carts lining the streets to the school in search of the perfect roses... or at least roses that don't look like they've been thrown in a salad tosser and smoked by a fourteen year old.

Of all the ways to spend your sunday, huh?*
*Totally chillaxing on the couch in Mawari's dorm, watching some really bad crime drama set in Caketown. For some reason, the people seated around a table on the TV are speaking chinese...*

*Wearing the classic powdered blue tux with a huge red bowtie that suspiciously enough, could belong to Aigis, Nagasumi bolts up to the Tsundere+Negi dorms with a bouquet of milky yellow carnations in hand, rapping at the door with his other.* Mawariiiii~!

*Despite being a guy again, Nagasumi still prances about the school grounds in his girls' school uniform, singing with the birds* No~one can telll us no~ Or where to go~ *A Red-Winged Blackbird lands upon his outstretched hand, chirping in harmony* Or say we're only dreeaaaming~~~

*An adorable girl with milky-white skin and fluffy, dark, cropped hair sits on a bright pink and goldenrod tassled cushion in the lobby; the bright orange she paints her toenails offering a stark contrast to her navy-blue sailor uniform.

She sings to herself as she coats her well-trimmed nails with the gaudy lacquer* 

He's My Brandy Alexander~ Always gettin' into trouble~ I'm His Brandy Alexander~ Always Gettin' Him into trouble~
*TEARING UP A PAIR OF KAI'S NICE SLACKS*
*Knocks on the door politely, dressed in a sexy buttan down shirt like he'd be meeting Mawari's parents for the first time!*

*Walking alongside Kai-tan on the prettified pink streets of the shopping district, dressed in his ~OH THANK GOD NORMAL CLOTHES* 

Don't you think it's strange, Mikawa?

*Chilling on the couch to some tunes, wearing nothing but an apron to cover his front*

Part fish~ part girl~ *pops open a can of cola and takes a gulp* I still miss~ I still miss~ your world~ 

*braaap*
*Saunters into the unlit and (thankfully) unoccupied dorm room, kicking off his shoes as he flops over on the couch, groaning.*
<font size=50>I'M SICK OF DEALING WITH THIS.</font size>
*Sitting on a bench, about to eat a very delicious looking slice of pizza!*

*The <del>frustrating</del> morning sunlight filters through the gaps in the green curtains, rolling over an exausted Nagasumi's sleeping face.*

..mm? 

*He opens his eyes drowsily, chin propped up on one of the many cushy pillows. Laying on your stomach's a really bad ha--..Wait, he's NEVER lied on his stomach before. Like most "normal guy" characters, he sleeps on his side! Nagasumi lets out a groan before rolling..only to be interrupted by..Shackles around his ankles and wrists?*

...

What.

*Stands absolutely dumbfounded in the Dorm hallway, staring down at a flier handed to him by a bubbly woman claiming to be a teacher before she abandoned him in his "new home". Her quick-winded explanation apparently wasn't enough to keep him from stiffening up in confusion.

A chilly wind blows a tumbleweed through hall.*
